pages.text: $(li)Shirostories made the $(l)Enders Journey Ender$(br)Dragon Enderite Ingot$(br)Drop Datapack$() to make appear Enderite Ingots after defeat the Ender Dragon.

pages.title: Shirostories (Datapa...)
pages.text: $(br)$(li)Shirostories made the $(l)Enders Journey Waystones Spawn Datapack$() to make Waystones to spawn when they are dropped to the ground.

pages.title: Shirostories (Datapa...)
pages.text: $(br)$(li)Shirostories made the $(l)Enders Journey End Crystal Beam Datapack$() to indicate the player what End Crystals are active during the Ender Dragon Boss Fight.

pages.title: Shirostories (Datapa...)
pages.text: $(br)$(li)Shirostories made the $(l)Enders Journey Remove End Crystal Effect Area$() to remove the Dragon Breath area provocated by the End Crystal explosions during the Ender Dragon Respawn.
